API description: Flight status, on-time performance and statistics by Flightera

API method.API method description:
Returns detailed airline statistics for airlines identified by the provided identifiers. In most cases the list should contain only one entry, unless the ident is ambiguous.
If searched by ident, only one airline is returned.
One of ident, iata, icao must be provided.
Statistics are calculated overnight and represent the current day's data.

API method parameters.name: icao
API method parameters.description: The ICAO code of the airline, must have a length of 4

constraints.inter-dependency: icao, ident, iata: one of ident, iata, or icao must be provided.

API method parameters.name: ident
API method parameters.description: The ident of the airline, as returned by /airline/search

constraints.inter-dependency: icao, ident, iata: one of ident, iata, or icao must be provided.

API method parameters.name: iata
API method parameters.description: The IATA code of the airline, must have a length of 3

constraints.inter-dependency: icao, ident, iata: one of ident, iata, or icao must be provided.

API method.API method description:
Returns detailed daily delay statistics for an airport identified by the provided identifiers. If searched by ident, only one airport is returned.
One of ident, iata, icao, localID must be provided. Additionally, `dt` and `isDeparture` are required.
Statistics are calculated overnight and represent the data for the specific date.

API method parameters.name: isDeparture
API method parameters.description: Flag indicating if the desired statistics are for departures (true) or arrivals (false)

API method parameters.name: dt
API method parameters.description: The date for which delay statistics are desired, formatted as "YYYY-MM-DD"

API method parameters.name: ident
API method parameters.description: The ident of the airport, as returned by /airport/search

constraints.inter-dependency: ident, iata, icao, localID: one of these parameters must be provided.
